title: Bug 17703 - Edit > Add Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
OB: When selecting a CU in the packages view and executing the 'File > Add Task' action, a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
EB: The 'File > Add Task' action should use the same dialog as the Java editor's ruler context menu when executed from the packages view.
SR: Update the 'Edit > Add Task' action in the packages view to use the same dialog as the Java editor's ruler context menu when executed.
